text: The difference between DC and here is the bikes you see are getting picked up and clustered back away from the neighborhood. In the article you posted, they're clustering them in those neighborhoods not serviced by Capital Bikeshare.
text_html: The difference between DC and here is the bikes you see are getting picked up and clustered back away from the neighborhood. In the article you posted, they're clustering them in those neighborhoods not serviced by Capital Bikeshare.

text: The dockless companies in Charlotte are clustering the bikes in areas where biking in common, usually within a short walk of a B-Cycle station. If somebody bikes to an area not near a cluster, it's picked up and taken away from that neighborhood.
